nodes.text: So how are things going for you today, sir?
Hey, great to see you again.
Another wonderful day at Hero-U, isn't it, sir?
Hello - how are things going with you?
Nice weather we're having, isn't it?
I'll assume that you are correct based upon normal weather patterns in Sardonia.
Hello, sir. How are you feeling today?
Good day sir. How are things here in the kingdom of books?
It is not a 'kingdom.' It is a repository of knowledge and I am the curator.
Do you have a map of the castle dungeons or secret passageways?
If I did, they wouldn't be very secret, would they? Some secrets are best left buried.
Do you happen to have a map of the Catacombs here?
Regrettably, no. Much of it was excavated recently over the past fifty years.
Is there a map of the Sea Caves somewhere here?
Oddly enough, no, there is no information on the Sea Caves in the library. All references to them have been purged from the records by my predecessors.

There are disturbing gaps in the information held in this library. Entire topics have been expurgated from the history of this castle. I have yet to uncover the lost information, or learn why it was removed.

options.text: Ask About the Nights of the Dead

nodes.text: What do you know about the Nights of the Dead?
The Nights of the Dead... I know that the boundaries between the realms of the living and the dead are thinning as more souls are crossing through the gates each year.
I know that it is an omen that the Chaos Gate will soon rise from the watery depths. The Dark Ones' minions will be summoned to open that gate and unloose the demons of Chaos into this world.

I know that if these minions are not stopped, they will awaken Gog'Sosloth from its eternal slumbers and summon the Dark One into this world. There will come madness, destruction, and death in the Dark One's wake.
However, that devastating catastrophe has apparently been avoided this year. We shall see if it can be avoided in the near future.
What's this about a Chaos Gate?
The Chaos Gate is a magical barrier barring the rift between Dimensions. The Knights Luminar who built this castle created it years ago and submerged it in the depths of the Sea Caves.
Dark Ones are beings of immense power that feed upon the emotions and magic of other creatures. They are psychic leeches who can manipulate thoughts and memories. To them, we are mere toys and food.
Gog'Sosloth is the Dark One that once terrorized Sardonia, driving men to madness and despair. It twisted their bodies and minds as it fed upon them.

Some men worshipped Gog'Sosloth, trying to placate the implacable. They traded their humanity and sanity for survival. Their twisted forms still roam the Sea Caves, awaiting the return of their dark god.
You mean that the Gogs were once humans?
So if we killed all the Gogs, the Chaos Gate can't be opened?
While that idea has some merit, it will not be the Gogs who can open the gate. It will take powerful magics to unbind the gate. Magics that only Wizards and Warlocks can wield.
So how do we stop this Chaos Gate from opening?
A very good question for which I have no answer.
But... it can be done, can't it? There's got to be something someone can do to keep the darkness away.
So why aren't there any Drats around here? The rest of the castle is infested with them.
I do not tolerate vermin in this library.
Do you live here in the castle?
This library has a literal wealth of information. However, my personal life is not part of it.
Be careful out there - this castle holds many dark secrets.
Try to avoid unnecessarily dangerous situations. You have too much potential to carelessly throw away your life.
Do try to show some semblence of respect in your choice of pleasantries with me. I feel as if my brain cells were being leeched away by inanity.
Is it nighttime already? My, how time flies...
